languages.text: "Я уже упоминал, что мы — друкари — истинные наследники древних эльдар. Тех эльдар, что владели всей галактикой. Наводили ужас и трепет на меньшие расы. Знали истины, на которые другие боялись даже взглянуть. Наши сородичи — те, что обретаются в реальном мире в вечном страхе перед Сай'лантреш — лишь тень былого величия. Мы, и только мы, несем в себе величие предков".

"I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."
languages.original_text: "Я уже упоминал, что мы — друкари — истинные наследники древних эльдар. Тех эльдар, что владели всей галактикой. Наводили ужас и трепет на меньшие расы. Мы, и только мы, несем в себе величие предков".

languages.text: “我之前说过，我们黑暗灵族是远古艾达灵族真正的继承人。我们的祖先曾统治着整个银河系，让那些弱小的族群敬畏不已。他们了解那些别人甚至连看都不敢看的真理。至于我们那群远房表亲，那群生活在真实世界中，始终对赛·兰斯雷什充满恐惧的灵族，他们不过是昔日光辉的阴影罢了。我们，只有我们，继承了我们的祖先的伟大遗产。”
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: “我之前说过，我们黑暗灵族是远古艾达灵族真正的继承人。我们的祖先曾统治着整个银河系，让那些弱小的族群敬畏不已。他们了解那些别人甚至连看都不敢看的真理。至于我们那群远房表亲，那群生活在真实世界中，始终对赛·兰斯雷什充满恐惧的灵族，他们不过是昔日光辉的阴影罢了。我们，只有我们，继承了我们的祖先的伟大遗产。”

languages.text: 「俺達デュカーリは、古代アエルダリの真の継承者ということはもう話したな。銀河系を丸々支配したアエルダリ。下等種族の胸に恐怖と畏怖を目覚めさせた者。他の者が一目見ることすら恐れる真実を知った者。俺達種族の遠縁の血筋ーーセランスレッシュに対する永遠の恐怖が渦巻くリアルスペースに住む者達はーーかつて偉大だったものの影に過ぎない。俺達だけが先祖の偉大な部分を継承しているんだ」
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: 「俺達デュカーリは、古代アエルダリの真の継承者ということはもう話したな。銀河系を丸々支配したアエルダリ。下等種族の胸に恐怖と畏怖を目覚めさせた者。他の者が一目見ることすら恐れる真実を知った者。俺達種族の遠縁の血筋ーーセランスレッシュに対する永遠の恐怖が渦巻くリアルスペースに住む者達はーーかつて偉大だったものの影に過ぎない。俺達だけが先祖の偉大な部分を継承しているんだ」

languages.text: «Ya he mencionado que los drukhari somos los auténticos herederos de los antiguos Aeldari. Los Aeldari que reinaron en toda la galaxia. Que inspiraron terror y reverencia en las razas inferiores. Que conocían secretos que otros temían contemplar siquiera. Nuestros parientes lejanos, los que habitan en el espacio real y viven con temor a Sai'lanthresh, no son sino una sombra de lo que fueron. Nosotros, y solo nosotros, perpetuamos la magnificencia de nuestros ancestros».
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: «Ya he mencionado que los drukhari somos los auténticos herederos de los antiguos Aeldari. Los Aeldari que reinaron en toda la galaxia. Que inspiraron terror y reverencia en las razas inferiores. Que conocían secretos que otros temían contemplar siquiera. Nuestros parientes lejanos, los que habitan en el espacio real y viven con temor a Sai'lanthresh, no son sino una sombra de lo que fueron. Nosotros, y solo nosotros, perpetuamos la magnificencia de nuestros ancestros».

languages.text: « Je vous ai déjà dit que nous autres Drukharis étions les héritiers légitimes des anciens Aeldaris. Ceux-là mêmes qui régnaient autrefois sur l'ensemble de la galaxie, inspirant la terreur et l'admiration aux races inférieures. Uniques dépositaires de vérités que les autres craignaient de regarder en face. Nos lointains cousins, qui habitent l'espace réel et vivent dans la crainte éternelle de Sai'lanthresh, ne sont plus que l'ombre de cette grandeur passée. Nous et nous seuls perpétuons le noble héritage de nos glorieux ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai déjà dit que nous autres Drukharis étions les héritiers légitimes des anciens Aeldaris. Ceux-là mêmes qui régnaient autrefois sur l'ensemble de la galaxie, inspirant la terreur et l'admiration aux races inférieures. Uniques dépositaires de vérités que les autres craignaient de regarder en face. Nos lointains cousins, qui habitent l'espace réel et vivent dans la crainte éternelle de Sai'lanthresh, ne sont plus que l'ombre de cette grandeur passée. Nous et nous seuls perpétuons le noble héritage de nos glorieux ancêtres. »

languages.text: "Ich habe ja schon erwähnt, dass wir Drukhari die wahren Erben der alten Aeldari sind. Die Aeldari, die über die gesamte Galaxis herrschten. Die bei minderen Rassen Angst und Schrecken verbreiteten. Die Wahrheiten verstanden, die andere nicht einmal anzublicken wagten. Unseresgleichen – die im Realraum leben, in ewiger Angst vor Sai'lanthresh – sind nur ein Schatten ihrer einstigen Größe. Wir, und nur wir, führen das Erbe unserer Ahnen fort."
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ja schon erwähnt, dass wir Drukhari die wahren Erben der alten Aeldari sind. Die Aeldari, die über die gesamte Galaxis herrschten. Die bei minderen Rassen Angst und Schrecken verbreiteten. Die Wahrheiten verstanden, die andere nicht einmal anzublicken wagten. Unseresgleichen – die im Realraum leben, in ewiger Angst vor Sai'lanthresh – sind nur ein Schatten ihrer einstigen Größe. Wir, und nur wir, führen das Erbe unserer Ahnen fort."

languages.text: "Sana hâlihazırda Drukhari'nin kadim Aeldarilerin hakiki vârisleri olduğundan bahsetmiştim. Tüm galakside hüküm süren, alt ırklarda hem dehşet hem de hayranlık uyandıran, diğerlerinin gizlice bakmaya bile ürktüğü hakikatleri bilen o Aeldariler... Şimdilerde Sai'lanthresh'in ebedî korkusuyla gerçekuzayda yaşayan uzak soydaşlarımızın o eski kudretlerinden eser kalmadı. Atalarımızın kudretini sürdürebilecek olanlar biziz. Yalnızca biziz."
languages.original_text: "I already mentioned that we Drukhari are the true inheritors of the ancient Aeldari. The Aeldari who reigned over the entire galaxy. Who inspired terror and awe in the lesser races. Who knew truths that others feared even to glance at. Our distant kin — the ones who dwell in realspace in eternal fear of Sai'lanthresh — are but a shadow of that former greatness. We, and only we, carry on the greatness of our ancestors."
